description:
This market will resolve to "BNK FearX Youth" if BNK FearX Youth win Game 1 against HANJIN BRION Challengers in this match in the LCK Challengers League Kickoff Group Stage, scheduled for January 12 at 2:00AM ET.

This market will resolve to "HANJIN BRION Challengers" if HANJIN BRION Challengers win Game 1 against BNK FearX Youth in this match.

If the match is concluded before Game 1 is played (e.g., a team clinches the match early), this market will resolve 50-50.

If the match is postponed, this market will remain open until the match has been completed.

If the match is canceled entirely with no make-up match, this market will resolve 50-50.

The resolution source for this market will be official information from https://liquipedia.net/leagueoflegends/Main_Page.

events.description:
This market will resolve to "BNK FearX Youth" if BNK FearX Youth win against HANJIN BRION Challengers in the named LoL match in the LCK Challengers League Kickoff Group Stage, scheduled for January 12 at 2:00AM ET.

This market will resolve to "HANJIN BRION Challengers" if HANJIN BRION Challengers win against BNK FearX Youth in the LoL match.

If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed.

If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.

The resolution source for this market will be official information from https://liquipedia.net/leagueoflegends/Main_Page.
